timeline.message: Clarify hidden param values in javadoc

timeline.bodyText: The constant should be DEFAULT_MAX_CONCURRENT_OPS, I thought it's a maximum configurable number of parallel ops and 256 seemed low...
timeline.author: viliam-durina
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -298,6 +300,12 @@ * Asynchronous version of {@link #mapUsingService}: the {@code mapAsyncFn} * returns a {@code CompletableFuture} instead of just {@code R}. *

+ * Uses default values for some extra parameters, so the maximum number + * of concurrent async operations per processor will be limited to + * {@value AbstractAsyncTransformUsingServiceP#MAX_CONCURRENT_OPS} and
